knimeNode.name: CV
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates the coefficient of variance which is the 100 times ratio of the standard-deviation and mean. Allows selection of multiple treatments.

fullDescription.intro:
The output will be a new table that contains CVs for each plate and treatment (rows) and selecteed readouts (columns).
A more detailed introduction into CVs and the use of robust statistics can be found in "High-Throughput screening in drug discovery, Hueser, 2006, Wiley".
fullDescription.option: The readouts for which CVs will be calcuated
The attribute which is used to group the wells (default=barcode)
A selection of filters which constrains the calculation of the CV to a subset of wells (default=treatment)

ports.outPort: New table that contains the CV for each group and treatment (rows) and selecteed readout (columns)
